nodes.text: Din Grrut was a Sith who died sometime prior to the arrival of the Dark Jedi Exiles in 6900 BBY. This Sith was interred in a personal tomb on the planet Korriban that Jen'jidai Sorzus Syn explored in her life. In her titular chronicle, Syn remarked that she would have died in this tomb, if she had not fed a Sith slave to the tuk'ata.
